QuestData.Title: A Stranger's Plea
QuestData.Description:
My people... enslaved...
Beaten... within death's grasp...
<The cowled figure weakly raises his arm, handing you a small liquid skin.>
Help... us...
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Prophet Velen at the Crown of Destruction.
QuestData.RewardText: A cowled figure... and it did not attack you?$B$BMost curious.
